name: pipecat-daily-bot
description: PipeCat Daily POC with bot and UI components

scripts.start:ui: npm run setup:ui && cd ui && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo run build --filter=@nia/events" "cross-env-shell BOT_RUNNER_MODE=1 USE_REDIS=false \"npm run start:server\"" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.dev:redis: concurrently "turbo run build --filter=@nia/events" "cross-env-shell USE_REDIS=true REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 \"npm run start:server\"" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:runner:daily: cross-env-shell RUNNER_AUTO_START=1 "node scripts/poetry-run.js run python runner_main.py"
scripts.start:runner:webrtc: cross-env-shell "node scripts/poetry-run.js run python runner_main.py -t webrtc --host 0.0.0.0 --port 7860"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ui && npm install && cd ../bot && poetry install
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && node scripts/poetry-run.js install --no-root --only main --no-interaction && node scripts/poetry-run.js run pip install -e ../../../packages/events/python
scripts.test: cd bot && (command -v poetry >/dev/null 2>&1 && poetry install --no-root --only main --no-interaction && poetry run pytest -q || python -m pytest -q)
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules ui/node_modules ui/dist bot/__pycache__ bot/*.pyc bot/.pytest_cache bot/.mypy_cache
